question: What is the most commonly used plasticizer in the world?
ground_truth: Among all phthalate esters, di-(2-ethylhexyl) phthalate (DEHP) is the most commonly used plasticizer worldwide.
system_answer: The most commonly used plasticizer in the world is Di(2-ethylhexyl) phthalate (DEHP), widely utilized in PVC plastics. It has been found to be present in high concentrations in the environment, posing health concerns due to its persistence and bioaccumulation properties.
